Issue Title: Wireframe to code must be upgraded to newer gpt model (gpt-4-vision-preview depricated)
Author: maekoos
Comment Body:
From what I quickly read on the [openAI Vision API website](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/vision) the api seems compatible with what is currently implemented: 
https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/blob/4dc4590f247a0a0d9c3f5d39fe09c00c5cef87bf/packages/excalidraw/data/magic.ts#L50-L104

Seems like all that is needed is to change the model to `"gpt-4o"`?

Issue Title: Wireframe to code must be upgraded to newer gpt model (gpt-4-vision-preview depricated)
Author: maekoos
Comment Body:
I got it working by only changing the model to "gpt-4o".

However, I found another issue in the process. Wireframes *inside* a frame will just generate a generic website:
![image](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/assets/73549739/f7416889-075e-4a27-ba7e-5d3a4ad47812)

A totally unrelated issue but also kind of awkward... :/

Issue Title: Wireframe to code must be upgraded to newer gpt model (gpt-4-vision-preview depricated)
Author: dwelle
Comment Body:
We're actually in the process of moving away from bring-your-own-token workflow as it was too complicated and introduced it early only due to extremely low API limits on OpenAI's part. Further, it's limiting us to only use a specific service if we wanted to do something more dynamic.

We'll be updating this soon.

Issue Title: Wireframe to code must be upgraded to newer gpt model (gpt-4-vision-preview depricated)
Author: yunuuuk1
Comment Body:
![excalidraw_ai_setting](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/assets/140899918/4c68848e-e62e-4339-bed5-788922e70a7a)
![P0001](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/assets/140899918/9938e272-be6a-4e8f-b66e-437d6b2ebc84)


I'm using the wireframe to code feature in Excalidraw, but I'm getting this error message:
Error!
The model gpt-4-vision-preview has been deprecated, learn more here: https://platform.openai.com/docs/deprecations
I also tried changing the default vision model to gpt-4o, but I'm still getting the same error. Can help me with this issue?"

Issue Title: Wireframe to code must be upgraded to newer gpt model (gpt-4-vision-preview depricated)
Author: maekoos
Comment Body:
As @dwelle said, they will be updating this soon.

If you need it right away and have a ChatGPT 4o token (you need to pay $5 on platform.openai.com I think) then you could try this version (the one generated from my pull request):

https://excalidraw-git-fork-maekoos-fix-8147-excalidraw.vercel.app/

Issue Title: Wireframe to code must be upgraded to newer gpt model (gpt-4-vision-preview depricated)
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: fixed via https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/pull/8269

Issue Title: [feature request] bill yearly
Author: ethanneff
Comment Body:
What is the status on this request? The roadmap says it is still in progress, yet it has been half a year without an update. I have multiple teams in my company that would love to use this feature. 

https://plus.excalidraw.com/roadmap

Issue Title: [feature request] bill yearly
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: Beta is open now, if you'd like to be part of it, shoot us an email at support@ — after that, we'll release publicly, which should happen fairly soon (~week).

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: mgudmund
Comment Body:
Example of a common use case when discussing software architecture: 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3577698/109808394-58c7f400-7c27-11eb-8499-cd77b7096401.png)

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: baldurh
Comment Body: I’d love to revive this discussion. Especially I’m interested in the crow's foot notation as suggested in https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/issues/616 I’m up for contributing on this but it seems all the issues and PRs strand on the interface part. Can we come to a conclusion on that so this can be taken forward? This is how it looks currently Do we want to stick with the 3x3 grid or change it to 4x4? Do we want to introduce some arrowhead "sets" so that you can switch between sets (standard, crow's foot, etc.). Something like or using an icon (disclaimer: obviously not a UX designer 🙈) That way we could eventually support all kinds of notations eg. different entity-relationship notations: What do you think @dwelle @lipis @steveruizok ? Links to other issues and PRs related to this: https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/issues/616 https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/issues/839 https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/pull/2486 https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/pull/3477

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: cocoonkid
Comment Body:
Just today we discussed replacing drawio with excalidraw but the lack of various arrow notations so far is unfortunately  a stopper rn.


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43231640/221795302-3f582729-2f27-451b-9c82-ecf7dcdf5fb4.png)



looking forward to see these implemented :)

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: peterhungnxp
Comment Body:
Please add this, super useful!!!
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72534365/228121010-0a41f5ae-f26f-4e1d-b70d-eb34684b5614.png)

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: edmondchuc
Comment Body:
Please also consider [UML class diagram arrowhead relationships](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Class_diagram#Relationships).

![Uml_classes_en](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/assets/37032744/68e355fb-0392-488c-abc0-b9b10c69fcf3)

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: murningstar
Comment Body:
Consider this also please. Sometimes this semantics is very wanted
![Screenshot_12](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/assets/104658898/866e0d2d-4bb1-4725-978b-4fbebd9b32b5)

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: vizvamitra
Comment Body: I also miss crowfoot notation a lot, it is much simpler than adding all those "1"s and "n"s. Also might be useful to add hotkeys for start/end arrowheads

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: AndrewBasem1
Comment Body: Still a much needed feature! please add crowfoot notation. (also thank you for all the hardwork)

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: georgekenessey
Comment Body: Yes this would be great, we would love to replace Lucidchart fully but the remaining thing we need to is crowfoot notation so we can create entity diagrams.

Issue Title: More arrow ending shapes
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: We've recently added more arrowheads so closing for now (https://x.com/excalidraw/status/1876276078177816692)

Issue Title: Transparent stroke
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: Will be added soon as part of the color picker redesign!

Issue Title: Transparent stroke
Author: inwardmovement
Comment Body: I think we should have easy access to white, black and transparent both in background and stroke color.

Issue Title: Transparent stroke
Author: tom-sherman
Comment Body: Is this as simple as adding transparent to the stroke color presets now? The question becomes: Which swatch should be dropped for transparent?

Issue Title: Transparent stroke
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: Don't know yet, but we'll be doing a full revamp of the colors very soon (both stroke and bg), which will include ensuring both transparent and white colors are in both.

Issue Title: Transparent stroke
Author: tom-sherman
Comment Body: Ah ok, that's the new color picker - gotcha.

Issue Title: Transparent stroke
Author: eproxus
Comment Body: I'd like this possibility too, is it included yet? I can't find it.

Issue Title: Transparent stroke
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: (fixed long ago)

Issue Title: Unusable amount of lag on Firefox with Excalidraw+
Author: torves
Comment Body: Not sure if anything got rolled back on the live app but this appears to no longer be an issue. Leaving open for another day to see if it re-occurs.

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: alshdavid
Comment Body: Agreed! I use Excalidraw with an iPad + stylus pen and this would give me a lot more room to work with. Currently the toolbar occupies a large portion of the working area encouraging me to draw in lower right corner

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: solomonshalom
Comment Body: > Agreed! I use Excalidraw with an iPad + stylus pen and this would give me a lot more room to work with. > > Currently the toolbar occupies a large portion of the working area encouraging me to draw in lower right corner > > Well, hope they add it as a feature!

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: There's the zen-mode (via context menu or Alt/Opt-Z), but it's not very usable because you won't be able to customize the shape properties.

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: solomonshalom
Comment Body:
> There's the zen-mode (via context menu or Alt/Opt-Z), but it's not very usable because you won't be able to customize the shape properties.

It's a great feature but I still want to access everything, while having the option to unhide or hide the toolbar

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: dwelle
Comment Body:
By toolbar, do you mean (2) or (1) as well? In your original post you mention both.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5153846/194894135-8ebc3b74-8ef8-4cd8-827b-99ffcb917347.png)

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: dhfherna
Comment Body: I can work on it, Can do you assign me?

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: dwelle

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: solomonshalom

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: solomonshalom
Comment Body:
> By toolbar, do you mean (2) or (1) as well? In your original post you mention both.
> 
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5153846/194894135-8ebc3b74-8ef8-4cd8-827b-99ffcb917347.png)

Just One, second is needed. The idea being if I were to close it, I can re-open it back on 2

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: This issue should be fixed by way of our new design.

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: Swoodend
Comment Body:
> This issue should be fixed by way of our new design.

So was this ever released? I'm having the same problem a year later

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: alshdavid
Comment Body:
> > By toolbar, do you mean (2) or (1) as well? In your original post you mention both.
> > ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5153846/194894135-8ebc3b74-8ef8-4cd8-827b-99ffcb917347.png)
> 
> Just One, second is needed. The idea being if I were to close it, I can re-open it back on 2

This wouldn't work on a tablet as I don't have a spacebar or mouse. Only a stylus and touch controls.

In my use case, a little chevron on the side of toolbar to toggle translating it off screen would be sufficient to open up the workspace

![image](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/assets/12656294/508fbbdb-f41c-48bf-ad2e-596eb46be003)

I guess this is a different issue than the main toolbar as I'm talking about toolbar to control the settings of the selected tool

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: infinite-ram
Comment Body: How do we hide the top toolbar?

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: alexandertam15
Comment Body:
Also - I need a feature to make the top toolbar/side menu toolbar text bigger. Control + should make the toolbar text size bigger as well.

I can barely see what the toolbar is saying as it's so small on my external monitor. Competitor Draw.io has this feature.

Issue Title: Feature Request - Toolbar Hide/Unhide
Author: soapergem
Comment Body: Can this issue be re-opened please? It never got a resolution. I just upgraded to Excalidraw+ this week and in some ways it seems like a downgrade now that the left bar is ever present and impossible to collapse. That left bar effectively occupies 15% of the screen and is not present on the free version. I am genuinely surprised there is no way to collapse it yet...

Issue Title: feat: grouped together Undo and Redo buttons on mobile
Author: dwelle
Comment Body:
Hi, and thanks for the PR!

How about putting undo/redo buttons always on the right so that they don't jump around if selection changes as part of the undo/redo action?

Issue Title: feat: grouped together Undo and Redo buttons on mobile
Author: abhitrueprogrammer
Comment Body: Thanks for the review! Sure, makes sense. Making the changes.

Issue Title: feat: grouped together Undo and Redo buttons on mobile
Author: abhitrueprogrammer
Comment Body: @dwelle made the required changes and updated the pr description accordingly,

Issue Title: feat: grouped together Undo and Redo buttons on mobile
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: Awesome, thanks!

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Nicbib
Comment Body: Hello j'ai le même problème que toi, je ne peux rien sélectionner. Je peux faire des formes sans problème mais je ne peux pas les bouger supprimer / écrire / sélectionner des éléments. Je ne sais pas comment faire pour retrouver la mobilité. Hier tout fonctionnait très bien. Tu as une astuce ?

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: adominguez
Comment Body: I just checked that if I clean the canvas and start from the beginning I don't have any problems, and also, the errors in the chrome inspector disappear

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Nicbib
Comment Body: Yes j'ai pareil que toi si je pars de zéro c'est ok mais pour tous fiches excalidraw uploader ça ne fonctionne pas c'est chiant parce que j'avais tout paramétré

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: adominguez
Comment Body:
> Hello j'ai le même problème que toi, je ne peux rien sélectionner. Je peux faire des formes sans problème mais je ne peux pas les bouger supprimer / écrire / sélectionner des éléments. Je ne sais pas comment faire pour retrouver la mobilité. Hier tout fonctionnait très bien. Tu as une astuce ?


What I'm going to try is to download the canvas in svg and inspect it to see if I see anything strange, but beyond that... no idea.

I imagine it has to be related to the console error that appeared above.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Nicbib
Comment Body: Oui je pense que c'est lié à l'erreur que tu as mentionné ci-dessus. Y a surement du avoir une mise à jour ou un truc comme ça. J'ai essayé de changer de navigateur mais rien n'y fait c'est la même chose.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: adominguez
Comment Body: Then I'm going to debug the svg, maybe there may be a poorly closed tag or something...

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Nicbib
Comment Body: Je pense que niveau code tu es 100 fois meilleur que moi si tu trouves la solution je suis chaud

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Nicbib
Comment Body: J'ai envoyé un mail au support pour voir

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: PabloLigeroIsla
Comment Body:
Same here!

Shortcuts (as Ctrl + a) also work. 

Thanks @Nicbib and @adominguez

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Nicbib
Comment Body: Merci pour ton retour @PabloLigeroIsla tu as une astuce pour éviter de tout sélectionner avec des raccourcis ?

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: PabloLigeroIsla
Comment Body:
No @Nicbib . Sorry. I also try to select just groups of elements. But was not possible. 

Another interesting addition,

- This is NOT happening in all of my boards in Excalidraw. Just in some of them.
- If a copy paste all the elements from an old Excalidraw which has the bug to a new one (clean new), the bug is reproduced again. 

I didn't identify the combination of elements that cause the bug.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: bepintocosta
Comment Body:
Hi everyone.
I have the same problem too.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: erik-vo
Comment Body: Same here!

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Nicbib
Comment Body: Toujours pas de nouvelles du support quelqu'un à réussi à avancer ?

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: adominguez
Comment Body: As I see, new commits have been added 3 hours ago, I don't know if there could be a problem in any of those files, perhaps the problem can be narrowed down https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/pull/7876

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: adominguez
Comment Body:
> Toujours pas de nouvelles du support quelqu'un à réussi à avancer ?


Nothing... For now, I'm going to open a new canvas and continue working there while this is being fixed, and once it's fixed, I'll transfer the changes from one to the other. At least that way I can keep making progress.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: mbbertolini
Comment Body:
****The files that have graphics generated by me are not allowing me to select any object in the drawing.
I have a set of artifacts that, if I could no longer use them due to any changes made there, would cause enormous harm to my work using the solution. I ask for support to resolve the issue.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: martin-blaus
Comment Body:
Im having the same issue, a null pointer on the p4 since its undefined, can't find the elements in the exported json (.excalidraw) to fix it.

Any solution?  I dont want to lose my work

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: adominguez
Comment Body:
I just started a new canvas, and I've encountered the same problem again when trying to add an object from a library. That might be where the issue lies.

![image](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/assets/30770867/6a9f310d-88e3-4476-8594-29c485b6cd71)

Perhaps now it's asking for some new property or something specific that these objects don't have, and that might be where the error is coming from.

If I undo (Ctrl + Z) and remove the added element, everything works correctly. So, it must be an issue with the objects being added to the canvas.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: git-nascimento-denison
Comment Body: Hey guys! I have the same problem. I need to continue work on my screen and it doesn't allow editing. I am desperate! I eagerly await the correction.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Fobhep
Comment Body: I can confirm the observation regarding adding library objects. I think this is triggering the error

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: emanuelelongo
Comment Body:
Same problem.
The only workaround I found is to import a backup file of my drawing on Obsidian end working there with the Excalidraw plugin.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: PabloLigeroIsla
Comment Body:
Workaround: 

Is posible to open and edit the .excalidraw files with the bug using the Excalidraw Plugin of VSCode. 

https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=pomdtr.excalidraw-editor

I test it and I can select individual elements.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Nicbib
Comment Body: Tu peux m'expliquer le process pour le mettre en place sur Mac ?

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: zaboco
Comment Body: I have the same issue. I noticed that it happens when I add a closed polygon which doesn't have 3n lines. So 3, 6, 9 is fine; others (4, 5, 8) trigger the error. Don't know if that helps, but it might be a starting point when debugging.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Fobhep
Comment Body:
> Tu peux m'expliquer le process pour le mettre en place sur Mac ?

Et pourquoi pas l'anglais ;) C'est Github, les discussions sont généralement en anglais pour que tout le monde comprenne.

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: martin-blaus
Comment Body: With the visual studio code plugin works fine, so it must be a newly deployed changed that breaks on undefined p4, p3. Not exactly sure what property are the failed objects missing

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: Fobhep
Comment Body:
Intellij plugin works fine as well - in case somebody is using not vscode:
https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/17096-excalidraw-integration

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: ryan-di
Comment Body:
Thank you all for reporting and following up on the issue ❤️ We're terribly sorry about the inconvenience this has caused. As @adominguez has correctly pointed out, this bug is caused by the recently merged #7636 refactor on geometry. 

Looking into it now! Hope to get back to you soon with a fix!

Issue Title: I can't select any elements on the canvas
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: Hi, we've reverted the deployment for now.

Author: Mrazator
Comment Body:
For future reference, there is already a PR:
https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/pull/7911

Author: Mrazator
Comment Body: Moved the tasklist to the release PR #9127.

Issue Title: docs: Docs for vNext 🚀
Author: Mrazator
Comment Body: Before we merge, let's discuss the naming of `StoreActions` as they are not super clear to the outside world #7898

Issue Title: docs: Docs for vNext 🚀
Author: Mrazator
Comment Body: As part of #8045 we also exposed `normalizeIndices` (apart from being accessible through `restoreElements` params). It's up to discussion whether we should also document it's standalone usage in docs, for now, it's not.

Issue Title: docs: Docs for vNext 🚀
Author: Mrazator
Comment Body:
Consider adding more documentation about a font picker - available fonts & styles, registration of custom fonts (once we have that), etc.

And correcting the existing docs, as a lot is pointing into the old webpack bundle.

Issue Title: docs: Docs for vNext 🚀
Author: Mrazator
Comment Body: Closing in favor of #9127

Issue Title: perf: Improved pointer events related performance when the sidebar is docked with a large library open
Author: dwelle
Comment Body:
Hey!

> However, this detour helped me identify the real bottleneck. I noticed that although pointer events no longer triggered React re-renders, there was still some unusual behavior. After some more investigation, I found that the App component frequently changes the --ui-pointerEvent CSS variable to block other elements' interactivity, and applying these changes was the root cause of the lags.
> 
> My proposed solution is to remove these changes while maintaining the same UX (i.e., no interaction with outside elements during canvas interaction). During a canvas pointer up event, we capture the pointer events to the canvas itself. This ensures that all other outside elements will be non-interactive until a pointer up event. I tested this solution and it provides the same UX as before, though there could be some edge cases I'm not aware of. Unfortunately, I have noticed the tests are failing because pepjs, the library that polyfills pointer events to jsdom does not properly support the capturing phase for pointer events. Still, I think this idea is worth considering at least.

Interesting find, and solution! I've mocked the API for tests since we weren't testing this part of the UI behavior anyway. We'll see if it bites us in the future.

I've also kept the old logic in case the `setPointerCapture` is not supported — while it has a good browser support, on mobile it's not quite universal, and a pointer handling shouldn't be something we'll completely break in those cases.

--

I'll need to go through the LibraryMenu changes tomorrow, but so far, looking good 👍.

Issue Title: perf: Improved pointer events related performance when the sidebar is docked with a large library open
Author: dwelle
Comment Body:
Alright, so [first](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/pull/9086/commits/9d90808c87a82994c515a6341523afefbb2d3efe) I removed the `pendingElements` update optimizations you made because there were issues with updates (e.g. when you change color of current selection, it wouldn't catch the change), and also it seemed it wasn't worth the effort.

But then I realized that in multiplayer scenarios it will rerender the `LibraryMenuContent` on every remote change because `cursorButton` will be `up` most of the time, so I [reintroduced](https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/pull/9086/commits/3e9707196311e87e733a674ef3d2818e53ab57bf) the memoization but made it a bit more robust — which also made it more complicated / slower. But it seems there's some non-trivial perf benefit.

That said, there are some non-intuitive things happening, such as that without the optim (technically _with_ the optim as well) there are more rerenders when the remote client is dragging an element you _don't_ have selected (which should bail) as opposed to editing your own selection. Unclear why, something that can be investigated later.

Thus, the quest for making Library sidebar more optimized continues, I would say — but I'm glad we've made a good step toward optimizing it :).

Thanks! ❤️

Issue Title: The `onChange` event is also executed for simple mouse movements.
Author: Mrazator
Comment Body:
> Is the execution cycle of these 'onChange' events intended?

Yes, we know it's suboptimal. However, you should be able to detect if an element has changed or not based on it's version. In the future we might have another API which does the version caching / detection it for you.

Issue Title: Images suddenly disappear
Author: dwelle
Comment Body: Hi. No related to premium. Could be a bug, but it's likely the browser decided to clear the IndexedDB where images are stored locally in the browser.

Issue Title: Firebase Configuration
Author: Mrazator
Comment Body:
> Firebase Storage is not available for free at this time?

That's unfortunate, seems like they removed the free tier. For free option you will need to fork the repo and try to use some other object storage.

Issue Title: Tax Residency Certificate for 2025
Author: Mrazator
Comment Body: Please ping us at support@excalidraw.com

Issue Title: Automatic switch between light/dark mode with Sphinx documentation
Author: Mrazator
Comment Body:
> somehow be able to dynamically change the color scheme from light to dark and viceversa

For this you would need to embed excalidraw instance inside the documentation portal and then change the theme based on you documentation theme with https://docs.excalidraw.com/docs/@excalidraw/excalidraw/api/constants#theme.

Otherwise, you can always export both light & dark versions of the scenes (i.e. as png) and then switch betwee them.
